Literature.Title: In vitro discriminative antipseudomonal properties resulting from acyl substitution of N-terminal sequence of dermaseptin s4 derivatives.
Literature.Author: Marynka K, Rotem S, Portnaya I, Cogan U, Mor A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=25µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=6µM)
